ovdesc.p: Trigger file used by recycler service to process pending transactions of an account during online
Trigger file is written whenever there is a credit or debit to an account
When a posting restriction is removed
When a block against an account is removed

desc.p: The id of an account to which the trigger happens
This id should be a valid account no present in RC.PENDING.TXNS
Specifies the refernce fo the trigger
Specifies the terminal no,Date and Time of trigger
Specifies what has triggered the online retry
Like posting of credit entry, removing posting restrictions, unblocking of funds on the settlement account
This is a valid override record
